title: Commerce
description: The records related to buying and selling activity.

order.title: Order
order.description: The placed order for one or more products.

cartAbandons.description: A product list has been identified as no longer accessible or purchasable by the user.

checkouts.description: An action during a checkout process of a product list, there can be more than one checkout event if there are multiple steps in a checkout process. If there are multiple steps the event time information and referenced page or experience is used to identify the step individual events represent in order.

productListAdds.description: Addition of a product to the product list, for example a product is added to a shopping cart.

productListOpens.description: Initializations of a new product list, for example a shopping cart is created.

productListRemovals.description: Removal or removals of a product entry from a product list, for example a product is removed from a shopping cart.

productListReopens.description: A product list that was no longer accessible (abandoned) has been re-activated by the user. Example via a re-marketing activity.

productListViews.description: View or views of a product-list has occurred.

productViews.description: View or views of a product have occurred.

purchases.description: An order has been accepted. Purchase is the only required action in a commerce conversion. Purchase must have a product list referenced.

saveForLaters.description: Product list is saved for future use, for example a product wish list.

inStorePurchase.description: 'inStore' purchase is saved for analytics use.
